body_html:
@drpngx - Can you give any more information on what you mean by "splittable files"?

In the end I've been going more in the direction of writing (a much more complicated) input function that feeds this data into a tf.learn Estimator using multiple threads in Python that feed data into a queue. This is basically done but seemingly very complicated to get right.

body:
@drpngx - Can you give any more information on what you mean by "splittable files"?

In the end I've been going more in the direction of writing (a much more complicated) input function that feeds this data into a tf.learn `Estimator` using multiple threads in Python that feed data into a queue. This is basically done but seemingly very complicated to get right.
